title: Following additional regulations shall be applicable for the development in the areas affected by the LIGO project
clause_text: Following additional regulations shall be applicable for the development in the areas affected by the LIGO project. Within the distance of 15 km. from the boundary of the site, no New Railway line shall be proposed.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Following additional regulations shall be applicable for the development in the areas affected by the LIGO project.
